name: CL_RSH_DESC
description: This table contains descriptions for research study information.

columns.name: RESEARCH_ID_RESEARCH_STUDY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the research study record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query. Each description will have its own line number.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The research study's description, which may be divided across multiple rows in this table.
